name: Porterhouse Steak
description: Served medium rare with potato rosti, Portobello mushroom, blue cheese, horseradish cream and port jus. (gf)

name: Lamb Shank
description: With a rich puttanesca sauce, potato mash and honey glazed carrots. (gf)

name: Chicken Breast
description: Pan seared then roasted served with sweet corn puree, potato gnocchi and toasted grana padano.
